org.apache.cayenne.dataview
Class DataView

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.cayenne.dataview.DataView

public class DataView
extends java.lang.Object

A root of the view configuration hierarchy. Contains a number of ObjEntityViews.

Since:
1.1
Author:
Andriy Shapochka
